org.adroitlogic.ultraesb.api

Class MessageFile

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.File
      • org.adroitlogic.ultraesb.api.MessageFile
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable

    public class MessageFile
extends java.io.File
    This is the default implementation of a temporary file, created and managed by a FileCache implementation Although this class extends java.io.File, only the specific constructor that passes the FileCache should be used The implementation supports arbitrarily large messages backed by an in-memory File. Note: Memory mapped file support is discontinued from UltraESB v2.x onwards The constructor is kept in-tact for backwards compatibility since this is an API class
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
